mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pending_notification ( id, template_id, template_name, type, receiver, subject, content, params, sender_system, request_id, priority, status, retry_count, max_retries, next_retry_time, created_time, updated_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{templateId}, #{templateName}, #{type}, #{receiver}, #{subject}, #{content}, #{params,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.StringTypeHandler}, #{senderSystem}, #{requestId}, #{priority}, #{status}, #{retryCount}, #{maxRetries}, #{nextRetryTime}, #{createdTime}, #{updatedTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE pending_notification SET template_id = #{templateId}, template_name = #{templateName}, type = #{type}, receiver = #{receiver}, subject = #{subject}, content = #{content}, params = #{params,typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.StringTypeHandler}, sender_system = #{senderSystem}, request_id = #{requestId}, priority = #{priority}, status = #{status}, retry_count = #{retryCount}, max_retries = #{maxRetries}, next_retry_time = #{nextRetryTime}, updated_time = #{updatedTime} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, template_id, template_name, type, receiver, subject, content, params, sender_system, request_id, priority, status, retry_count, max_retries, next_retry_time, created_time, updated_time FROM pending_notification WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, template_id, template_name, type, receiver, subject, content, params, sender_system, request_id, priority, status, retry_count, max_retries, next_retry_time, created_time, updated_time FROM pending_notification WHERE status = 'pending' AND (next_retry_time IS NULL OR next_retry_time <= NOW()) ORDER BY priority DESC, created_time ASC
